full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I ZHI RGYAS DBANG DRAG GI DRUG CU PA SKYONG TSUL LAS BZHI LHUN GRUB MA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BSKAL BZANG BKRA SHIS RGYA MTSO,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(CES DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO PHYOGS SKYONG DANG BCAS PA LA DBYUG GU DRUG CU RTZA BZHI'I GTOR MA'I SGO @013B NAS ZHI RGYAS DBANG DRAG GI 'PHRIN LAS JI LTAR BCOL BA'I TSUL MDOR BSDUS SNYING POR DRIL NAS, SNGAR MI DBANG SEN NO YON CHEN PO'I ZHABS BRTAN DU DRUG CU PA TSAR MANG DU BSNGO DGOS BYUNG SKABS ZHI BA'I BSKOR RNAMS BKOD PA LA, LAS BZHI TSANG BA ZHIG DGOS ZHES, RAB 'BYAMS BSKAL BZANG YE SHES KYIS YANG YANG BSKUL ZHING, NYE CHAR MKHYEN DPYOD YANGS PA DBU MDZAD RAB 'BYAMS PA GRAGS PA BSAM 'PHEL GYIS KYANG RGYAS DBANG GNYIS BSNAN PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN CHER BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^GRO BTZUN BSKAL BZANG BKRA SHIS RGYA MTSOS, KUN GZIGS BDUN PA'I GSUNG DANG SGO BSTUN, DAM PA'I PHYAG BZHES DANG MAN NGAG GIS BRGYAN TE BRIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,DAM CAN CHOS RGYAL PHYOGS SKYONG BCAS PA LA, DRUG CU RTZA BZHI'I GTOR MA LEGS BSNGO BAS, ,NAD DANG BGEGS SOGS BAR CHAD BZLOG PA DANG, ZHI RGYAS DBANG DRAG LAS RNAMS 'GRUB PAR MDZOD, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
